ARABIC: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذْنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجًا مُّنِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and a caller to Allah by His permission and a light-giving lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And to call (men) to God by His leave, and as a lamp resplendent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: as one who calls people to Allah by His leave, and as a bright, shining lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: a preacher for God by His permission and as a shining torch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And as a caller towards Allah, by His command, and as a sun that enlightens. (The Holy Prophet is a light from Allah.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And as one who invites to Allah by His leave, and as a lamp spreading light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And as one inviting to Allah by His permission, and as a light-giving torch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: calling unto God by His leave, and as a light-giving lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And as a summoner unto Allah by His permission, and as a lamp that giveth light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: As one who calls people to God by His leave, and guides them like a shining light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And a summoner unto Allah by His command and an illuminating lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and as a summoner to Allah by His permission, and as a radiant lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And as one who invites to Allah's (grace) by His leave, and as a lamp spreading light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And as one who invites to Allah [Islamic Monotheism, i.e. to worship none but Allah (Alone)] by His Leave, and as a lamp spreading light (through your instructions from the Quran and the Sunnah the legal ways of the Prophet SAW).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: a caller to Allah by His permission and as a light shedding lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And a caller towards God by His leave, and an illuminating beacon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And one who invites to Allah, by His permission, and an illuminating lamp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:46] and as a summoner to God, to obedience to Him, by His leave, by His command, and as a illuminating lamp, in other words, the equivalent of it, in terms of one’s being able to find guidance therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And as a summoner unto Allah) unto the religion and obedience of Allah (by His permission) by His command, (and as a lamp that giveth light) and taken as an example to follow.
